directions: Combine pineapple chunks and coleslaw in large bowl.
Stir together salad dressing, cilantro, cumin, salt and garlic.  Pour over salad; toss to evenly coat.  Sprinkle corn chips on top, if desired.
ingredients: 1 (20 ounce) can DOLE® Pineapple Chunks, drained
1/2 cup reduced-fat southwest ranch or spicy ranch dressing
title: South of the Border Slaw from DOLE®
